Module JavaProject
Package restaurant.controller

Class OrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • restaurant.controller.AbstractController<java.util.List<Order>>
      • restaurant.controller.OrderController
  • public class OrderController
extends AbstractController<java.util.List<Order>>

    Business logic pertaining to Order. It involves the create, read, update and delete functionalities.

    Inherits AbstractController and passes Order as the object type for IO operations.

    Author:
    Hakiim, CheenHao

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private static java.lang.String ORDER_DIRECTORY  
      private java.util.List<Order> orderList
      The model type used for data manipulation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OrderController()
      If data from file is not retrieved successfully, create new instance of Order.
